target.mrk: 発行組織および発行機関の追加

trans-unit.source: Add an <uicontrol>Issuing Authority</uicontrol> and <uicontrol>Issuing Organization</uicontrol> into the <uicontrol>Internal Information</uicontrol> area on the <uicontrol>Create Permit</uicontrol> screen.

seg-source.mrk: Add an <uicontrol>Issuing Authority</uicontrol> and <uicontrol>Issuing Organization</uicontrol> into the <uicontrol>Internal Information</uicontrol> area on the <uicontrol>Create Permit</uicontrol> screen.

target.mrk: <uicontrol>許可登録</uicontrol>画面の<uicontrol>内部情報</uicontrol>領域に<uicontrol>発行機関</uicontrol>および<uicontrol>発行組織</uicontrol>を追加します。

trans-unit.source: Step 5 begins by either filling in the mandatory <uicontrol>Issuing Organization</uicontrol> field manually or by searching for business partners in the optional <uicontrol>Issuing Authority</uicontrol> field.

seg-source.mrk: Step 5 begins by either filling in the mandatory <uicontrol>Issuing Organization</uicontrol> field manually or by searching for business partners in the optional <uicontrol>Issuing Authority</uicontrol> field.

target.mrk: ステップ 5 は、必須の<uicontrol>発行組織</uicontrol>項目をマニュアルで入力するか、オプションの<uicontrol>発行機関</uicontrol>項目でビジネスパートナを検索することから開始します。

trans-unit.source: If you choose a business partner in the <uicontrol>Issuing Authority</uicontrol> field, this value will be copied into the <uicontrol>Issuing Organization</uicontrol> field.

seg-source.mrk: If you choose a business partner in the <uicontrol>Issuing Authority</uicontrol> field, this value will be copied into the <uicontrol>Issuing Organization</uicontrol> field.

target.mrk: <uicontrol>発行機関</uicontrol>項目でビジネスパートナを選択すると、この値が<uicontrol>発行組織</uicontrol>項目にコピーされます。

trans-unit.source: For this to happen, you start by choosing the value help in the <uicontrol>Issuing Authority</uicontrol> field. A popup will be displayed.

seg-source.mrk: For this to happen, you start by choosing the value help in the <uicontrol>Issuing Authority</uicontrol> field.

target.mrk: これを行うには、<uicontrol>発行機関</uicontrol>項目で入力ヘルプを選択して開始します。
ポップアップが表示されます。

trans-unit.source: Use the <uicontrol>Search</uicontrol> field in the popup to search for all business partners or you can use the list available. Once you have chosen a business partner, the <uicontrol>Issuing Authority</uicontrol> field will automatically be filled in and become read only.

seg-source.mrk: Use the <uicontrol>Search</uicontrol> field in the popup to search for all business partners or you can use the list available.
Once you have chosen a business partner, the <uicontrol>Issuing Authority</uicontrol> field will automatically be filled in and become read only.

target.mrk: ポップアップの<uicontrol>検索</uicontrol>項目を使用してすべてのビジネスパートナを検索するか、利用可能な一覧を使用することができます。
ビジネスパートナを選択すると、<uicontrol>発行機関</uicontrol>項目が自動的に入力され、読込専用になります。

trans-unit.source: For more information on these fields, please use the available <uicontrol>Help Topics</uicontrol> inside the app.

seg-source.mrk: For more information on these fields, please use the available <uicontrol>Help Topics</uicontrol> inside the app.

target.mrk: これらの項目の詳細については、アプリ内で利用可能な<uicontrol>ヘルプトピック</uicontrol>を参照してください。
